testCase.requirementText: Type of locator mets/fileSec/fileGrp/file/FLocat[@LOCTYPE='URL'] The locator type is always used with the value “URL” from the vocabulary in the attribute.
testCase.description: The LOCTYPE-attribute is mandatory according to the METS schema. It has enumeration requirements '[ARK, URN, URL, PURL, HANDLE, DOI, OTHER]'. It must be a value from the enumeration. The CSIP77 tightens this and states it must only be the value "URL".

rule.description: The value in the LOCTYPE-attribute must be "URL"

error.message: The value in the LOCTYPE-attribute must be "URL"
